com.versant.connector.common
Class LocalTransactionImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.connector.common.LocalTransactionImpl

public class LocalTransactionImpl
extends java.lang.Object

LocalTransactionImpl class provides support for transactions that are managed internal to an EIS resource manager, and do not require an external transaction manager. This common implementation is used by both the spi.LocalTransaction and cci.LocalTransaction to demarcate the local transactions.

Constructor Summary
LocalTransactionImpl(javax.resource.spi.ManagedConnection mc, java.lang.Object localRes, boolean sendEvents)
          Constructor
 
Method Summary
 void begin()
          Begins a local transaction.It also fires the event in case the component has called this method to demarcate a resource manager local transaction on the underlying EIS instance.
 void commit()
          Commits a local transaction.It also fires the event in case the component has called this method to demarcate a resource manager local transaction on the underlying EIS instance.
 void rollback()
          Rollbacks a local transaction.It also fires the event in case the component has called this method to demarcate a resource manager local transaction on the underlying EIS instance.

equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

LocalTransactionImpl

public LocalTransactionImpl(javax.resource.spi.ManagedConnection mc,
                            java.lang.Object localRes,
                            boolean sendEvents)
Constructor

Parameters:
mc - of type ManagedConnection. The ManagedConnection instance is used for firing the events.
localRes - of type LocalResource. All the calls to the transaction demarcation methods are delegated to this instance.
sendEvents - of type boolean. The events are fired based on this boolean parameter. If set to true, the events are fired otherwise are not fired.
